note.p: Career: Taught at Jena; travelled to Holland and England where he met Robert Boyle (FRS 1663); returned to practise in Minden (1684) and Halberstadt; Professor of Medicine, Halle (1693); Personal Physician and Counsellor to Friedrich I in Berlin (1709-1712)
Memberships: Deutsche Akademie der Naturforscher Leopoldina (1696)
Proposers: Frederic Slare; Henry Plumptre; Sir Hans Sloane
